tasks.task: Plant and care for Epipremnum aureum (Devil's Ivy) ceiling vines
subtasks: Determine a suitable planting technique for the ceiling
Create a grid pattern using fishing line on the ceiling
Mount hooks at intervals to support the grid
Attach vines to the grid using metal clips or hooks
Water and maintain the plants for optimal growth
Harvest and rejuvenate the plant by removing older leaves and branches
Manage the growth of vines to prevent interference with ceiling lamps
Encourage root growth by providing moisture to the stem
Monitor plant health and address issues such as yellowing leaves
Adapt to local lighting conditions and plant color variations
